text: This is a list of Brazilian television related events from 1987. ==Events== ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ===1970s=== *Turma da Mônica (1976–present) ===1980s=== *Xou da Xuxa (1986-1992) ==Ending this year== ==Births== *19 June - Sthefany Brito, actress *24 July - Rainer Cadete, actor *11 August - Jonatas Faro, actor & singer *21 October - Tiago Abravanel, actor & singer *1 November - Marcello Melo Jr., actor, singer-songwriter & model ==Deaths== ==See also== *1987 in Brazil
title: 1987 in Brazilian television
